text: Alois Leodolter (born 16 August 1931) is an Austrian skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1960 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Austria Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1960 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Styria Category:People from Bruck an der Mur District
title: Alois Leodolter
